name: Box Truck Adventures
description:
A weird prototype I built on Christmas Eve 2017.  This is my idea of "relaxing", apparently.  Jump a box truck across a gap.

Controls:
Escape - Close the game.
R - Reset the box truck (when not in the main menu)
F - Give the box truck more speed, because it's not going fast enough already???
Spacebar - Jump that mothertrucker, because it's totally realistic to do.

System Requirements:
- Any Windows computer that isn't a potato still running Windows XP.  AKA, any Windows computer capable of running DirectX 11 games.

Do you like it?  Want more?  Comment below and I'll consider taking this from a prototype to a full game.  And try to hunt bugs you find, because that's just a thing one does.
